authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai

group.title: Connect the Stars — An endless movie trivia game
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: If you enjoy answering "What movies was she in?" and "Who was in that movie again?", you'll enjoy this game!

group.title: M◐◑N DAYS — a web app for creating lunar calendar events
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: My dad celebrates his birthday according to the Chinese calendar, but calendar apps don't support recurring lunisolar events.

group.title: Why I Write
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: Our bodies were never built to to contain all our thoughts and feelings. So we write.

group.title: Three Years of Melodrama
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: To celebrate Lorde's album Melodrama, I made a webpage adaptation of the lyrics booklet that comes with the physical CD.

group.title: Review: The Wind Rises
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: I learned about the origins of the name Ghibli yesterday. It's central to this film's thesis.

group.title: How I Find Movies
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: Lessons on choosing the next movie to watch, going to film festivals, and sifting through all the streaming services.
